title: Site-wide QA polish: unify green color, buttons/cards styling, verify header/WhatsApp, links, images, and YouTube embeds

requirements.text: Audit the entire MORSHID frontend and ensure every green UI color used anywhere on the site is exactly hex #25D366 (including backgrounds, text, borders, icons, hover/focus states, and Tailwind/CSS variables), replacing any other green values (including dark/light greens) with #25D366 without changing any other non-green colors.

quotes: All green colors must be exactly #25D366

acceptanceCriteria: No UI element uses any green color other than #25D366 (verified by inspecting computed styles for representative elements across Home, For Farmers, and Contact).
Existing non-green colors (e.g., grays, whites, blacks, and any non-green accent colors) are not changed as part of this task.

requirements.text: Standardize button styling site-wide so all buttons share the same visual style: rounded corners and consistent padding/height across all pages and sections, without editing any files under frontend/src/components/ui (immutable).

quotes: All buttons same style: rounded corners, consistent padding

acceptanceCriteria: All buttons across Home, For Farmers, and Contact have the same corner radius and consistent padding/height when rendered at the same size variant.
No changes are made to any files under frontend/src/components/ui; consistency is achieved via composition/wrappers and/or consistent usage classes.

requirements.text: Standardize card styling site-wide so all cards have shadows and consistent borders (same border width/color and shadow intensity), across all pages, without editing any files under frontend/src/components/ui (immutable).

quotes: All cards have shadows and consistent borders

acceptanceCriteria: All Card instances across the site show a visible shadow and consistent border styling.
Card styling is consistent between Home, For Farmers, and Contact (e.g., same border thickness and baseline shadow), while preserving existing layout and content.

requirements.text: Verify the header remains sticky on every route and during scrolling, and fix any cases where it is not sticky (including z-index/overlap issues), without changing header content or navigation structure.

quotes: Header is sticky on all pages

acceptanceCriteria: On Home (/), For Farmers (/for-farmers), and Contact (/contact), the header stays fixed at the top while scrolling.
Header does not get covered by page content (correct stacking context).

requirements.text: Verify the floating WhatsApp button is visible on all pages and remains fixed while scrolling; fix any route/layout issues that could prevent it from rendering.

quotes: Floating WhatsApp button visible on all pages

acceptanceCriteria: Floating WhatsApp button renders on Home, For Farmers, and Contact and remains visible while scrolling.
The button link remains exactly https://wa.me/212623237732 and opens in a new tab.

requirements.text: Ensure all images used across the site are high-quality and clearly depict Moroccan farmers; if any existing generated hero images do not meet this standard, update/replace them while keeping the same file paths referenced in code.

quotes: All images are high quality and show Moroccan farmers

acceptanceCriteria: Hero background images on Home and For Farmers are visually high-resolution (no visible pixelation/compression artifacts at common desktop widths) and clearly show Moroccan farmers in a realistic agricultural context.
Existing image URLs referenced by the pages continue to resolve (no broken images).

requirements.text: Validate that all links across the site work correctly and point to the intended destinations (navigation links, WhatsApp links, mailto link, external app link, and any footer attribution link), and fix any incorrect/broken links without changing displayed text.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links route correctly between /, /for-farmers, and /contact.
All WhatsApp CTAs link to https://wa.me/212623237732.
Email CTA uses mailto:hello@tmu.ai and works.
App CTA links to http://app.morshid.ai and opens successfully.
No anchor element has an invalid href (e.g., empty, '#', or malformed URL) unless required for current behavior.

requirements.text: Verify the two YouTube videos on the Home page display properly (correct embed URLs, responsive sizing, and not blocked by incorrect iframe attributes) and fix any embed issues while keeping the same video IDs.
acceptanceCriteria: Both iframes render and play: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=19kU6cAwXXk and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DnTsf91_UCk (via their embed URLs).
Videos remain responsive (maintain aspect ratio) and are visible on mobile and desktop widths.

constraints: Do not change anything else beyond the requested QA fixes (no new sections, no new copy, no layout/content changes unrelated to the items listed).
Do not edit any immutable frontend paths, including anything under frontend/src/components/ui and the Internet Identity/actor hooks listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend (Motoko) must remain unchanged (no new canisters, no new methods).
nonGoals: Changing marketing copy, section order, or page structure beyond what is required to fix the listed issues.
Introducing new integrations or backend data storage.
Rewriting the design system; only unify the specified styling inconsistencies.

edits: Replace with a high-quality photo-realistic image clearly depicting Moroccan farmers (morshid-hero-farmer-family.dim_1920x1080.png > morshid-hero-farmer-family.dim_1920x1080.png)

Replace with a high-quality photo-realistic image clearly depicting Moroccan farmers (morshid-for-farmers-hero-hands-whatsapp.dim_1920x1080.png > morshid-for-farmers-hero-hands-whatsapp.dim_1920x1080.png)

preferencesToAdd: Prefers strict site-wide QA/polish changes only, with minimal scope and no unrelated modifications.
